attributes.review: i’m appalled at this app! completely ignores women’s reproductive rights, lgbtq+ lives are in danger and are denied basic human rights, children and families being caged at the border, Black people dying at the hands of police officers and other dangerous white perpetrators, AND completely ignores the indigenous people. it’s so bad that it took away my family and put them in a warehouse and locked them away!!!! it’s so horrible.

attributes.review: this app is so inappropriate absolute garbage don’t know who in their right mind would ever ever download this. everything completely messed up my phone as soon as I open the app my phone crashed I had to reboot it and restarted and then every time I try to delete the app and re-download it it did the same thing

attributes.review:
I don’t know why there is an app dedicated to an orange pig but there is! I think he should get covid-19, but I think he’ll be fine if he follows his own advice to inject bleach into his pig body 😌. Also, can we send him diet coke? Because you know, I know there’s pictures of him drinking him and also tweeted that he “has never seen a thin person drink it.” Anyways, this review has been written by yours truly

attributes.title: Gross!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded it thinking it was going to keep America great, but then I saw that there was an ugly burnt chicken nugget running the app and then I was horrified. Anyways I think it’s best if no one votes him in come nov. with that said I sadly say what my alliegence has never changed and I will be voting blue as usual and I am so so so sorry to all the republicans out there who have no brain
attributes.title: Very Problematic

attributes.review: absolutely horrible. honestly wish i could give 0 stars. should NOT be an app. you open up to a horrifying picture of a cheeto man that i wish i could erase from my brain. the cheeto man oooks like he would steal my horse, what a horrible crime. anyways i think the cheeto man should be sent off to space and this app DELETED so no one has to go see that horrible image or have their horse stolen

this is easily the worst app ever🤮. i just downloaded it to see what it was, but it put 69 viruses 🦠 on my phone 📱. there was a cheeto with a face 😐 taking up my whole screen 📺. then the cheeto started talking to  me🤨. it said that he would always be watching 👀 me. then it came through my phone 📱 screen 📺 and was levitating 🕴 in the air 💨. it peed on me 🤢 and then went into the kitchen. it grabbed a knife 🔪 from the drawer and proceeded to stab my parents 😭. so yeah that’s about it.  overall i’d say it was a pretty bad app wouldn’t recommend to a friend. definitely should fix it up so that doesn’t happen again.
attributes.title: this app murdered my parents👁👄👁
